successes.title: STEM System: The Best Way to Interact with Virtual Worlds
successes.description: Wireless, modular motion tracking system for the most natural and intuitive interaction with video games, virtual reality, and more.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU for helping us to deliver the STEM System!
T-shirt (choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense”). Exclusive to Kickstarter backers.
All three T-shirts (“VR Pioneer”, “STEM” and “Powered by Sixense”). Exclusive to Kickstarter backers.

(EARLY BIRD) TWO-TRACKER BUNDLE. Great for gaming. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs). Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

ONE-TRACKER MOBILE BUNDLE. 1 Base + 1 STEM + 1 STEM Pack. Does NOT include Controllers. Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

TWO-TRACKER BUNDLE. Great for gaming. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs). Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

(EARLY BIRD) THREE-TRACKER BUNDLE. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs) + 1 STEM Pack (including 1 STEM). Ideal for applications requiring tracking of two hands plus an additional point (e.g., a head-mounted display for VR). Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

THREE-TRACKER BUNDLE. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs) + 1 STEM Pack (including 1 STEM). Ideal for applications requiring tracking of two hands plus an additional point (e.g., a head-mounted display for VR). Includes  carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

(EARLY BIRD) FIVE-TRACKER BUNDLE. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs) + 3 STEM Packs (including 3 STEMs). Great for tracking the entire body (hands, feet + head/chest/waist). Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

FIVE TRACKER BUNDLE. 1 Base + 2 Controllers (including 2 STEMs) + 3 STEM Packs (including 3 STEMs). Great for tracking the entire body (hands, feet + head/chest/waist). Includes carrying case and choice of “VR Pioneer”, “STEM” or “Powered by Sixense” t-shirt. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

SILVER BUNDLE. 1 Base + 5 STEMs + 5 Controllers + 5 STEM Packs. This is a maxed-out system. Also receive one pre-production prototype and participate with Sixense in final stages of testing and quality assurance. Includes personalized Kickstarter-exclusive carrying case and all three t-shirts (“VR Pioneer”, “STEM” and “Powered by Sixense”). Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

DEVELOPER DOUBLE BUNDLE. 2 Bases + 10 STEMs + 10 STEM Controllers + 10 STEM Packs. Great for development using two bases on one host. Also receive one pre-production prototype and participate with Sixense in final stages of testing and quality assurance. Includes personalized Kickstarter-exclusive carrying case and all three t-shirts (“VR Pioneer”, “STEM” and “Powered by Sixense”). Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

DEVELOPER TRIPLE BUNDLE. 3 Bases + 15 STEMs + 15 STEM Controllers + 15 STEM Packs. Great for development using three bases on one host. Also receive one pre-production prototype and participate with Sixense in final stages of testing and quality assurance. Includes personalized Kickstarter-exclusive carrying case and all three t-shirts (“VR Pioneer”, “STEM” and “Powered by Sixense”). Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

GOLD BUNDLE. Includes the ENTIRE SILVER BUNDLE reward PLUS a Generation 2 prototype and participate with Sixense in final stages of testing and quality assurance PLUS spend a full day with the Sixense team in California. Your name will also appear in the “Thank You” section of the documentation. Airfare and hotel not included. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.

PLATINUM BUNDLE. Includes the ENTIRE SILVER BUNDLE reward PLUS Generations 1 AND 2 prototypes PLUS receive a pre-production prototype and participate with Sixense in final stages of testing and quality assurance, PLUS be Sixense’s guest at the Game Developer Conference in San Francisco in 2014. Your name will also appear in the “Thank You” section of the documentation. Airfare and hotel not included. Additional charge for international (non-US) shipping -- please see FAQ.
